EntryName	PIGL_HUMAN
ProteinName	N-acetylglucosaminyl-phosphatidylinositol de-N-acetylase (EC 3.5.1.89) (Phosphatidylinositol-glycan biosynthesis class L protein) (PIG-L)
GeneName	PIGL
Length	252
Function	Catalyzes the second step of glycosylphosphatidylinositol (GPI) biosynthesis, which is the de-N-acetylation of N-acetylglucosaminyl-phosphatidylinositol.
Subcellular Location	Endoplasmic reticulum membrane
